# Draft:Empire Movers and Storage NYC

----
Empire Movers and Storage NYC is a family-owned moving and storage company headquartered in New York City. Founded in 2007 by Florin Petruța, the company provides local and long-distance moving services, with a specialization in white glove delivery, commercial relocations, and interior design moving services.
History
Empire Movers and Storage NYC was created in direct response to unethical practices witnessed within the moving industry. Florin Petruta, the company’s founder, was appalled by movers openly discussing how to scam customers on moving day. This inspired him to launch a moving company rooted in integrity, transparency, and focused on customer care..
Founded in 2007, the company used grassroots marketing in its early days: flyers, postcards, and door-to-door outreach. A key turning point came when a satisfied residential client hired Empire Movers and Storage for nonprofit housing projects, a partnership that continues to this day. From there, the company expanded into interior design moving services in NYC and secured repeat corporate contracts .
Today, Empire Movers and Storage NYC operates 8 trucks, employs over 30 team members, and offers a full suite of moving and storage services, including hoisting, shuttle delivery, artwork installation, and NYC storage units .
Founder
Empire Movers and Storage NYC was founded in 2008 by Florin Petruța, a European entrepreneur who immigrated to the United States. Petruța established the company with the stated aim of addressing unethical practices reported within the moving industry, incorporating european principles.  The business has remained family-owned since its founding and, under Petruța’s leadership, has expanded its range of services while continuing to focus on the handling of clients’ belongings.
Moving services
Empire Movers and Storage NYC offers residential, commercial, and specialty moving services. These include:
* Office moving in New York City, including modular workstation handling and IT infrastructure moves .
* White glove moving services, including packing, crating, and installation of fragile, high-value furniture and artwork .
* Hoisting services for oversized items in buildings without elevator access.
* Receiving, inspection, storage, and installation services for interior designers through its climate-controlled warehouse .
* Monthly art and furniture shuttle service connecting New York City, Miami, and The Hamptons.
* Climate-controlled storage for short- and long-term needs .
Notable projects
Mark Kostabi – Moving an artist’s life’s work
In 2025, Empire Movers and Storage coordinated the relocation of the New York apartment belonging to American painter and sculptor Mark Kostabi. The project involved the transport of large sculptures, framed paintings, and a grand piano. Due to the size and fragility of the works, the company used custom-built crates, protective materials, and hoisting techniques to move items through restricted urban spaces. Some pieces were temporarily stored in climate-controlled facilities before delivery to their destination.
Air France – Launching La Première suite
Empire Movers and Storage coordinated the reception, unpacking, and staging of Air France’s new Première first‑class seating systems, which were transported in custom wooden crates. The NYC moving company managed the logistics of assembling sophisticated aviation‑grade components under strict deadlines, ensuring the seating systems were perfectly staged for launch. Empire Movers and Storage worked closely with Air France’s on‑site teams to align logistics with the launch schedule, facilitating the introduction of the new suite.
Assisting interior designers – Sandra Weingor NYC design projects
The moving company is noted for its services supporting interior design professionals in New York City, such as Sandra Weingor. Sandra has collaborated with Empire Movers and Storage for over 12 years, highlighting long-term partnership .
Recognition and awards
In 2025, Empire Movers & Storage Corp. was ranked No. 137 on the Inc. Regionals: Northeast list, an annual ranking published by Inc. magazine that highlights the fastest-growing privately held companies in the northeastern United States. The recognition reflects the company’s revenue growth over a two-year period as measured by the publication’s criteria.
Sustainability commitment
Empire Movers and Storage NYC is committed to sustainability. For every completed move, the company plants a tree in partnership with OneTreePlanted, reinforcing its eco-conscious approach to business.
The company also contributes to community-based organizations and offers discounted moving and storage services to local nonprofits .
Operations and contact
As of 2025, Empire Movers and Storage NYC operates a fleet of 8 trucks and employs over 30 team members. Its headquarters are located at 641 Lexington Ave, 14th Floor, New York, NY 10018, United States, and its main storage facility is located at 30-30 Hunters Point Ave, Long Island City, NY 11101, United States
